thread.title: Zotec Partners to Host Live Technology Demonstrations at the ANESTHESIOLOGY 2015 Annual Meeting
thread.title_full: Zotec Partners to Host Live Technology Demonstrations at the ANESTHESIOLOGY 2015 Annual Meeting

author: admin
title: Zotec Partners to Host Live Technology Demonstrations at the ANESTHESIOLOGY 2015 Annual Meeting
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/13/2015 @ 6:44 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Zotec Partners 
INDIANAPOLIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Zotec Partners (Zotec), an industry-leading provider of anesthesiology billing and practice management services, announces that it will exhibit and provide Comprehensive Zotec Analytics and Reporting (CZAR) demonstrations at the American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) ANESTHESIOLOGY 2015 Annual Meeting. This five-day event attracts upwards of 15,000 attendees from around the world to grow, share and network. 
CZAR is a sophisticated analytical tool that works 24 hours a day, seven days a week and 365 days a year to actively monitor the entire revenue cycle of an anesthesiology practice. Zotec is pleased to announce it will provide anesthesiologists attending the ANESTHESIOLOGY 2015 Annual Meeting with live CZAR demonstrations during exhibit hours. Details for the trade show can be seen below: 
What: ANESTHESIOLOGY 2015 Annual Meeting 
Where: San Diego Convention Center 
When: October 24-28, 2015 
Booth Number: 3544 
Zotec is the industry leader in medical billing and practice management services for the hospital-based specialty market. The company is committed to the continuous pursuit of excellence in the physician revenue cycle and practice management industry by delivering effective solutions through its innovative software, personalized service and measurable client results. Zotec proprietary processes and technology manage in excess of 70 million medical encounters across all 50 states. For more information about Zotec Partners, visit http://www.zotecpartners.com . 
About Zotec Partners 
Founded in 1998 by CEO T. Scott Law, Zotec Partners is the Indianapolis-based industry leader in specialized medical billing and practice management services for the hospital-based specialty market. Zotec Partners is committed to the continual pursuit of excellence in the physician revenue cycle management industry by delivering effective solutions through its innovative software, personalized service and measurable client results. Currently, the company serves more than 8,000 physicians in all 50 states. For more information about Zotec Partners, visit http://www.zotecpartners.com .
